column4: help, what to do to file a bug report against a package that launchpad.net doesn't recognize?
what ubuntu version do you have?
really? doesn't that bug report to bugzilla.gnome.org?
it's not a gnome package, it's a universe package (libortp)
I'm not sure I agree with that :)
it is for ubuntu not for gnome
problem is, bugzilla.ubuntu.com redirects to launchpad.net for bugs in universe packages
are you using gnome right now?
you click the bug report tool it will send you to right place
i'm using gnome, but this is a simple library, unrelated to gnome platform
use the tool or dont im telling you its not just for gnome
unless it doesn't file bugs to gnome.org... I'll try, thanks
